Title: Deems human remains to be abandoned if not acted upon within a certain period of time
Summary: Deems human remains to be abandoned if not acted upon within a certain period of time and authorizes the person in possession of such remains to dispose of them.
LawCode: Amd ยง4201, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the disposal of human remains which have been deemed abandoned
